title: Silver 1 Jg/Top Main LF Team
body:
Looking for a team to play ranked 5s and even tourneys. I main jg. Can play any role but other than jg i also prefer top. 

op.gg of my 2 accounts
http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Dom1nAtAr (OCE)
http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=poMPSKYX3 (NA)

replies.body:
HI mate, 
we are a team you may be interested in. we have set training days. and gaming days. I am preparing to put us into a tournament quite soon. hit me up in LOL my name is critical strike

Ay man, I'm looking to start a ranked team once iv got enough players, I'm currently in Bronze 3 and want to climb but with a team that isn't salty or toxic. If ya don't mind playing with a less experienced player but a quick learner, then hit us up if you're keen to join. IGN: CastielZaim11
